name: Dicey Dash (Lazertrax, theMeth, Riolite, project-AFRO)
description:
MADE in  48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam! DESCRIPTION

Dicey dash is an endless runner game where you have to keep rolling the dice and avoid the coming chips to score high!

Occasionally you'll encounter combo pads with allows you to start a score combo based on the current dice value. Use this to your advantage to score high

Compete with other players to the top of the score board!

CONTROLS
  • WASD or Arrows to Move
  • Enter to Accept
  • R to Restart
IMPORTANT NOTE 
  1. Before Playing please go to Change Player in the main menu to pick a nickname so you can make it to the top of the leaderboard!
  2. The Web version might be more buggy than the windows version. So If you wish you can download a windows executable from downloads below.
CREDITS
  • Lazertrax 
  • Riolite
  • theMeth
  • Project Afro
  • Som3az
Thanks for playing!
